sentences.sContent: Or in solutions, where your solutes, your solute molecules are mixing around.
sentences.sContent_eng: Or in solutions, where your solutes, your solute molecules are mixing around.
sentences.sCn: 或者是溶液状态溶质，溶质分子相互混合。

words.tran: 有偿付能力的；有溶解力的
解决方案；溶液；溶解；解答
[化学] 溶解；[化学] 溶剂化作用；溶化
[数] 可解性；解决之可能性；溶解度

trans.tranCn: [化学] 溶质；[化学] 溶解物
trans.tranOther: the component of a solution that changes its state in forming the solution or the component that is not present in excess; the substance that is dissolved in another substance
